Getting Started
===============

Installation
------------

To use The Gambling Game, first create a virtual environment::

   python -m venv .venv

Then, activate the virtual environment::

   source .venv/bin/activate

Finally, pip install the ``requirements.txt`` file:

.. code-block::

   (.venv) $ pip install -r requirements.txt

You can now run the game to test that it is working:

.. code-block::

   (.venv) $ python run_game.py
